wikipedia_page.main: Anthony James Nelson (born 12 April 1930 in Cardiff) is a Welsh former professional footballer who played in the Football League for Newport County and Bournemouth as a centre half.His father was footballer Jimmy Nelson who was born in Scotland (playing for the national team four times), raised in Northern Ireland and settled in Wales.

response: Anthony or Tony Nelson may refer to:
* Tony Nelson (I Dream of Jeannie), a character in the TV series I Dream of Jeannie
